hadith.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Umar: That the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "On the day of judgement, Allah will not look at one who arrogantly drags his garment. [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from Hudhaifah, Abu Sa'eed, Abu Hurairah, Samurah, Abu Dharr, 'Aishah and Hubaib bin Mughfil. The Hadith of Ibn 'Umar is Hasan Sahih
